chapter.title: The Gunslinger
chapter.para: The man in black fled across the desert, and the gunslinger followed.
The desert was the apotheosis of all deserts, huge, standing to the sky for what might have been parsecs in all directions.

chapter.title: The Way Station
chapter.para: A nursery rhyme had been playing itself through his mind all day.
Es muy importante la lectura de este articulo

article.title: Economia en paises de Europa
article.para: Con objeto de observar las tendencias de la investigación sobre salud en Europa, se analizó la producción de artículos resultantes de investigaciones biomédicas

book.title: El libro mas corto del mundo
